H0.text: What is the value of the letter ‘K’ in the game of Scrabble. 3

H1.text: What is the value of the letter ‘K’ in the game of Scrabble. 8

H2.text: What is the value of the letter ‘K’ in the game of Scrabble. 2

H3.text: What is the value of the letter ‘K’ in the game of Scrabble. 5

A4.text: In the Polish-language edition of Scrabble, the letter ‘K’ is worth 3 points, as indicated by the distribution 'K ×3' under the 2 points category.

A5.text: The text does not explicitly state the value of ‘K’ in the standard English Scrabble set, but the hypothesis of 5 points aligns with common knowledge outside the provided text.

A6.text: The Norwegian Scrabble set excludes ‘K’ entirely due to its rarity, which contradicts the hypothesis that ‘K’ is worth 2 points in the game.

A7.text: The text does not provide any information supporting the hypothesis that ‘K’ is worth 8 points in Scrabble.
